Posts.Content: I am asking this information for a friend.  She doesn not have internet.  Does anyone out there know where she can get any catalogs for mastectomy bra's?  What I have found so far on the internet is only for ordering online.  She is kind of a private person and would prefer a catalog/s to see what is available out there.  If anyone can help, it would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks in advance.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy

Posts.Content: Thanks to everyone. I am passing all this information along to my friend. I have always been on the Crohn's message board, and have always received so much helpful information. This forum is as equally helpful. Thanks again. God Bless you all.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy
